title: Haze Me
description: Aidan's life fell apart when he found out about his dad's real family. Enrolling at the same college as his half-brother to somehow get revenge might not have been a smart choice, but it was all he had. The problem is that Foster has all the power and is protected by his fraternity.Pledging his frat seems like the easiest way to gain access to him. But when hazing gets taken much farther than Aidan could ever have imagined, he discovers his inner exhibitionist that he never knew he had. And what's worse is that it's his own flesh and blood that's forcing all this on him.Haze Me is an erotic short story about half-brothers pushing each other's boundaries. It contains dub con, hazing, public humiliation & degradation kink, and group sex.word count: 11,389
author: B.L. Sparrow
